document.full_text: the annual celebration of arts in lower manhattan will feature philip glass, laurie anderson, patti smith, rufus wainwright, sean lennon and rosanne cash, as well as a two-castle production of "henry v."
document.title: river to river festival announces lineup
lines_and_colors: the annual celebration of arts in lower manhattan will feature philip glass, laurie anderson, patti smith, rufus wainwright, sean lennon and rosanne cash, as well as a two-castle production of "henry v."
